revisions.rev:
{{Infobox software| name = MUTE | screenshot = | caption = Screenshot of MUTE on Linux | developer = [[Jason Rohrer]] | discontinued = Yes | latest_release_version = 0.5.1 | latest_release_date = April 23, 2007 (unmaintained) | operating_system = [[Cross-platform]] | genre = [[File sharing]], [[Anonymous P2P|Anonymous peer to peer]] | license = [[Public domain]] | website = [http://mute-net.sourceforge.net mute-net.sourceforge.net] | }} The '''MUTE Network''' (or '''MUTE-net''') is an unmaintained [[peer-to-peer]] [[file sharing]] network developed with anonymity in mind. The MUTE client is [[open source]] software released under the [[Public domain]] and includes support for the [[Linux]], [[Mac OS X]] and [[Microsoft Windows]] computer [[operating system]]s.
==History of MUTE== MUTE was developed by [[Jason Rohrer]] using a routing [[algorithm]] based on [[ant colony optimization]].<ref>{{cite news | title = Covering tracks: New privacy hope for P2P | publisher = [[CNET News]] | date = February 24, 2004 | url = http://www.news.com/2100-1027_3-5164413.html}}</ref>
==Software compatible with MUTE network== *[http://calypso.sourceforge.net/ Calypso] (built from the source code of Kommute <ref>http://sourceforge.net/apps/phpbb/calypso/viewtopic.php?f=2&t=2</ref>) * Kommute (project stopped in 2010, last version was v0.24) *[http://napshare.sourceforge.net/ NapShare] (stopped in 2005)
==See also== {{Portal|Free software}} *[[File sharing]] *[[Anonymous P2P]] *[[Comparison of file sharing applications]]
==References== {{Reflist}}
==External links== *[http://mute-net.sourceforge.net/ Official website] *[http://sourceforge.net/projects/mute-net/ MUTE SourceForge website] *[http://www.planetpeer.de/wiki/index.php MUTE wiki and FAQs] *[http://board.planetpeer.de/index.php/board,32.0.html MUTE forums] *[http://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/mute-net-discuss MUTE mailing list] *[http://mute-net.sourceforge.net/howPrivacy.shtml How the MUTE Anonymous P2P network works]
